Text.Page:
The argons hit our foundry at {@Rgn:48008}. I need you to find {@LinkCreature:248#1030}.

We can't afford to lose any of the minds behind the cyanocannon effort.

Yeah, the argons hit us hard. Lost most of my contingent.

I sent our survivors to the Cyanocannon Foundry. That's where they'll do the most good.

I'll let {@LinkCreature:248#1015} know my status.
